animals.name: Lion
animals.description: The lion (Panthera leo) is a large cat of the genus Panthera, native to Africa and India. It has a muscular, broad-chested body; a short, rounded head;

animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: Zebras (subgenus Hippotigris) are African equines with distinctive black-and-white striped coats.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: Elephants are the largest living land animals. Three living species are currently recognised: the African bush elephant (Loxodonta africana),
